name: Santa Moto Bike Rider
description:
**Hip Hip Hurrrryyy**

The holidays are fast approaching. Who wants to play the role of the Santa? Let’s get on your transporter bike and deliver bumper gifthampers to doorsteps. Drive in the city and spread happiness with Christmas gifts on this holy festive. Santa Moto Bike Gift Transport is a Santa 3D heavybike game to deliver Christmas gifts to people. In Santa gift delivery games our crazy santa is coming to spread some happiness and joys among the city people and brings gifts for them. Play a part in spreading the wondrous joy. Drive around in the gift delivery and deliver the gifts on time to all. Do not leave anyone out for it is the holiday season and everyone must get their presents! If you want to make your Christmas day memorable then install "Santa Moto Bike" and enjoy Christmas. Enjoy the best christmas gift delivery game by blowing Christmas gift bubbles and giving santa christmas gift carts to children. You can make use of Christmas gift budget to by buy gift carts and make your Christmas eve memorable. Drive christmas bike to enjoy chirtmas eve and reach to maximum people to surprise them.

Game Features:

- High end quality graphics with 3D effects
- Challenging missions with santa gift games.
- User friendly game play
- Cool Winter theme with snow
- Excellent Christmas sound effects
- Different Camera Angles to explore the 3D city Environment
- Meet Challenges to enjoy Base Missions
